statements: UPDATE traffic_monitoring SET traffic_flow = 100 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE traffic_monitoring SET congestion_level = 'Low' WHERE location = 'Highway A'
UPDATE traffic_monitoring SET traffic_flow = 100, congestion_level = 'High' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE traffic_monitoring SET congestion_level = 'Low', location = 'Highway 101' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE traffic_flow SET congestion_level = 3, flow_level = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE map_settings SET show_traffic = FALSE, zoom_level = 10 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE traffic_flow SET congestion_level = 3, flow_level = 2 WHERE location = 'Main Street';
UPDATE map_settings SET zoom_level = 10, show_traffic = true WHERE map_type = 'satellite';
UPDATE traffic_monitoring SET traffic_level = 2 WHERE location = 'Main Street';
UPDATE traffic_cameras SET status = 'Offline' WHERE camera_type = 'Speed Camera';
UPDATE traffic_monitoring SET traffic_level = 3, congestion_level = 2 WHERE location = 'Highway A' AND id = 1;
UPDATE traffic_cameras SET status = 'Offline' WHERE camera_type = 'Red Light' AND location = 'Intersection X';
UPDATE TrafficFlow SET congestion_level = 3 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Sensors SET sensor_type = 'Temperature' WHERE sensor_id = 2;
UPDATE TrafficFlow SET congestion_level = 3, timestamp = '2022-02-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Sensors SET sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor' WHERE sensor_id = 4;
UPDATE TrafficCameras SET location='Broadway Avenue' WHERE camera_id=1;
UPDATE TrafficIncidents SET description='Major accident on highway' WHERE incident_id=2;
UPDATE TrafficCameras SET location = 'Main Street' WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE TrafficIncidents SET description = 'Accident on Highway' WHERE incident_id = 5;
